abstract: The Southern Company hopes to build two reactors in Burke County, near Augusta, Ga., in what would be the first such construction since the 1970s.
snippet: The Southern Company hopes to build two reactors in Burke County, near Augusta, Ga., in what would be the first such construction since the 1970s.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  President Obama is to announce on Tuesday a loan guarantee to allow construction of two nuclear reactors in Georgia, according to administration officials.

headline.main: U.S. to Back Loans for Reactors
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Back Loans for Reactors
